Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Charge your full travel fares to your CIMB Visa Signature, and automatically get travel accident insurance coverage of up to US$500,000 for you and your family.
10% cashback on Wine and Dine and Online Spend in Foreign Currencies; 0.2% cashback on all other local and overseas spend.
0% administrative fee for foreign currency transactions. Cross border fee of 1% levied by Visa still applies.

Details.Name: sc_gift_details
Details.Feature: Limited edition ez-link card with S$40 stored value

Details.Name: sc_gift_cond
Details.Feature: 1. Successfully apply for 2 new principal CIMB Credit Cards (except CIMB Classic MasterCard) 2. Make a minimum of 3 transactions with either of the approved principal CIMB Credit Card within 1 month from the card approval date. 3. Application must be approved no later than 30 April 2016

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Minimum Repayment: 3% of the outstanding balance or S$50.

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: 10% cashback is capped at S$60 per statement month. Upon reaching the cap of S$60, 0.2% cashback is applied on the additional spend. No cashback cap for 0.2% cashback.
Waiver of 1.4% foreign currency administrative fee charged by CIMB will be credited as cashback in the following statement month.
A minimum spend of $500 with at least 8 transactions of $30 or more per statement month has to be charged to the card for 10% cashback.
